metadata.synopsis: Wyll evil ending, in which he sits the throne in Wyrm's Rock, passing judgement on the patriars before setting out to "unify" the rest of the coast.

6.speaker: Narrator
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close up of Wyll sitting the throne in Wyrm's Rock, sneering down at something.

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Before, you used to worry what lay behind those smiles. Whether they would kneel for you of their own accord, or at the beckoning of your father.*
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: We track along a line of patriars cowering at the foot of the throne, illithid guards hovering to either side.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *But you know better, now. What matters is that they do kneel - let the 'why' be for lesser men.*
0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A pause, and Wyll raises his his hand lazily. With a pulse of psionic power, the patriars before him transform into mind flayers, kneeling before.

If available, Ravengard goes last and most gruesomely, transforming on 'lesser men'.

2.context: NodeContext: Mizora stands at Wyll's side and smirks

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *For the city, for the Coast, for the entire world - there will be something approaching peace. But first:*
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Exterior shot over the city - the NETHERBRAIN, pulsing in obediance to Wyll's command. Portals being to open, lighting up the sky.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: CLOSE-UP of Wyll, no trace of anything heroic left in his face - only the tyrant.

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *Before, you used to worry what lay behind those smiles. Whether they would kneel in honour of your deeds - or in memory of your father's.*
4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: We track along a line of patriars cowering at the foot of the throne, illithid guards hovering to either side.

IF AVAILABLE - RAVENGARD STANDS AT THE END, STARING BACK AT WYLL WITH DEFIANCE

7.speaker: Narrator
7.text: *But you know better, now. What matters is that they do kneel - let the 'why' be for lesser men.*
7.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A pause, and Wyll raises his his hand lazily. With a pulse of psionic power, the patriars before him transform into mind flayers, kneeling before.

If available, Ravengard goes last and most gruesomely, transforming on 'lesser men'.
